preqs: ENG2092 or ENG2005, ECE2071 or TRC2400 and ECE2011 or TRC3500 or FIT1002 for students studying double degrees with science

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do true Otherwise (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ENG2005, ENG2092} and  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ECE2071, FIT1002, TRC2400} and  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ECE2011, TRC3500})
For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do Any co-req unit set {MAE-ELEC, MAEELEC01} Otherwise true
Incompatible with (I/W) {ECE4711, ECE4712, ECE5076, ECE5711, ECE5712}

description: This unit aims to develop an understanding of methods for extracting useful information (eg 3-D structure; object size, motion, shape, location and identity, etc) from images. It will allow students to understand how to construct Computer vision systems for robotics, surveillance, medical imaging, and related application areas.
